pages.text: The Spectral Talisman prevents phantom aggression.  Phantoms will still spawn, they will just not attack.  They will still be mad if you attack them. The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_explorer)Force of Explorer$(/l).
